newsitem.title: USA: Box Energy Corp year loss vs profit.
newsitem.headline: Box Energy Corp year loss vs profit.

text.p: (All Data Above 000s Except Per Share Numbers)

NOTE: Company did not report Q4 results. It previously reported a 9 mth loss of $4.2 million, or $0.20/shr, on revenues of $52.7 million for 1996 compared to a 1995 profit of $3.5 million, or $0.17/shr, on revenues of $42.0 million.

1996 loss came on increased exploration expenses due to higher dry hole costs; higher depreciation, depletion and amortization as a result of increased property basis and a decrease in oil and natural gas reserves; and increased administrative costs related to reimbursement to the Cloyce K. Box Estate of litigation costs and the "change in control" on July 30 that triggered severance agreements. Nine month report noted adminstrative costs included $1.9 million of reorganization costs. ((-- New York Newsdesk 212-859-1610.))
